Header <boost/test/data/monomorphic/generate.hpp>

Defines generic interface for monomorphic dataset based on generator. 

namespace boost {
  namespace unit_test {
    namespace data {
      namespace monomorphic {
        template<typename Generator> class generated_by;

        template<typename Generator> struct is_dataset<generated_by< Generator >>;
      }
    }
  }
}
